name: Tormater 2: Electric Boogaloo
description:
Tormater 2 is finally here! Tormater 2 is an expansion of Tormater 3D, with new graphics, sounds, enemies, weapons, items, and an entire new playable character!

Tormater 2 has everything you need that Tormater 3D doesn't! You'll feel snazzy once you download this TorMasterpiece.

Get the latest version here.
(updates will be added to the tormater website before they get added to the itch page)

Join the Tormater discord

Controls:
  • Move camera: Mouse
  • Fire weapon: LMB
  • Secondary fire weapon: RMB
  • Change weapon: Mouse Scroll
  • Move character: W, A, S, and D
  • Use switches/open doors: Space
  • Pause game: ESC

System Requirements:

  • Dual-core 2.4GHz 64-bit processor
  • A dedicated GPU from 2012 or later, or integrated from 2016 or later
  • 4 GBs of RAM

Operating System Requirements (for pre-compiled binaries):

  • Windows Vista or newer
